column4: geepers in synaptic i search jre and it finds basically 2 versions  jre5   and jre6    but the jre5 has a star on it as though that should be the best choice. so now what? now i cant even formulate a question
there should not be two versions available which suggests that perhaps something went horribly wrong between versions. can I install both of them ??
No, that's just fine.  The Java 5 JDK is much more widely used than the (very new) Java 6 JDK, and they're parallel installable.
ok thanks . some times this stuff just explodes into chaos with no hints
